column1: #: description: Event selection cutflow for a representative signal sample for the discovery SR-HM. The masses of next-lightest-neutralinos and LSPs are reported.  While the first row of the table reports the total raw MC events produced
column2: all subsequent rows show weighted events. Only statistical uncertainties are shown. Samples are produced with generator filters which selects $h\rightarrow b\bar{b}$ and $W\rightarrow\ell\nu$ decays.

column1: #: keyword reactions: P P --> CHARGINO1 NEUTRALINO2 X
#: keyword phrases: SUSY | Supersymmetry | Electroweak | Proton-Proton Scattering
